name: Pocket Automatic Teller Machine
description:
A fast-paced algorithm game. Super-simple！When you wait for subway, bus, it’s a nice weapon to kill time, which contains various interesting patterns.

Through ATM you can quickly enhance and restore your math skills, and get fun form it. Also it can bring unparalleled experience for lovers of all ages.

Play your favorite game while traveling.

【Feature】

※ By Quickly calculating the figures given by the simulator, so as to successfully take the money.

※ Classic mode: The time can be re-calculated when you calculate the figure within the limited time, players can easily enjoy the game.

※ Endless mode: The time can be added when you calculate the figure within the limited time, the player can continue to challenge.
